titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring His Maiesties pleasure concerning the dissoluing of the present conuention of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our palace at Westminster, the sixth day of Ianuary, in the nineteenth yeere of our raigne ..."--P. [4].
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
